p: Viability of PCLS was assessed by Calcein AM/ethidium homodimer-1 staining as described before [ 15]. From each PCLS, triplicates of 30 μm thick 3D stacks were analyzed using IMARIS 7.4.0 software (Bitplane Scientific Software, Zurich, Switzerland), as described previously [ 15]. The ratio of counted dead cell nuclei (ethidium homodimer-1 positive) to total volume of cytoplasm of living cells (calcein stained) was calculated as dead cell nuclei/10 6 μm 3 cytoplasm volume.
